Avatars

Global variables

$avatar-class: "-avatar" !global
$avatar-border-radius: 3px !global
$avatar-border-width: 4px !global
$avatar-border-style: solid !global
$avatar-margin: 0.6em !global
$avatar-size: 64px !global

Include -thumbnail widget inside -avatar.

The -thumbnail will be hidden on devices with resolution smaller than 768px.
